CustomField.formula: CASE( License_Currency__c, "DKK", Yearly_License_Cost__c, "SEK", Yearly_License_Cost__c* SEK_to_DKK__c, "USD", Yearly_License_Cost__c* USD_to_DKK__c, "GBP", Yearly_License_Cost__c* GBP_to_DKK__c, "EUR", Yearly_License_Cost__c* EUR_to_DKK__c, 0 )
CustomField.label: Yearly Cost Per License in DKK
